p: These mechanisms may account for immunomodulation of the inflammatory response in COVID-19 secondary to CP administration. As showed above, recent reports suggest the production of antiphospholipid antibodies in patients with COVID-19 together with an antiphospholipid-like syndrome [ 66], and the regulation of this cascade could be critical to avoid deleterious outcomes in these group of patients ( i.e., thrombosis, disseminated intravascular coagulopathy).
